snippet.title: 2D Platformer Game - STRATUM
snippet.description:
Follow me on Twitter for more news: https://twitter.com/stratumthegame
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/stratum/283520
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/stratum
Website: https://loadingstratum.com/
Tumblr: http://stratumgame.tumblr.com/
This is just a sneak-peak into STRATUM, a 2D platformer game currently under development for PC.
   Stratum is my vision, created entirely by me from music to art to level design and it is heavily based on story telling and Boss fighting.
   I plan to create a whole new history/world of our ancestors' beliefs. The story includes many personalities of Christianity put in a whole new perspective seen by a Dacian (main character) warrior.
   The game is purely a work of fiction, I respect everyone's beliefs and do not want to offend anyone.

Dacian history: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dacians
